SELECT COCO_CODE, /*경조코드*/ COCO_NAME, /*경조명*/ COCO_KIND, /*경조종류*/ FRCW_CODE, /*가족관계*/ CCBS_BEDE, /*시작일*/ CCBS_ENDD, /*종료일*/ EXCC_AMOT, /*경조금액*/ WORK_PROD, /*근속연수*/ CCIT_CODE, /*경조용품*/ REMK_200X, /*비고*/ INST_USID, /*입력자*/ INST_DATE, /*입력일*/ UPDT_USID, /*수정자*/ UPDT_DATE, /*수정일*/ 0 USE_CNT FROM CW_COCOBS
COCO_KIND = #COCO_KIND#
FRCW_CODE = #FRCW_CODE#
COCO_CODE = #COCO_CODE#
COCO_KIND || FRCW_CODE || CCBS_BEDE IN ( SELECT COCO_KIND || FRCW_CODE || MAX (CCBS_BEDE) FROM CW_COCOBS WHERE CCBS_BEDE <= #CCBS_BEDE#
COCO_KIND = #COCO_KIND#
FRCW_CODE = #FRCW_CODE#
GROUP BY COCO_KIND, FRCW_CODE )
ORDER BY COCO_KIND, FRCW_CODE, COCO_CODE
SELECT COUNT (*) AS USE_CNT FROM CW_COCOAP WHERE COCO_CODE = #COCO_CODE#
SELECT COUNT(*) AS USE_CNT FROM CW_COCOBS WHERE COCO_KIND = #COCO_KIND# AND FRCW_CODE = #FRCW_CODE# AND #CCBS_BEDE# BETWEEN CCBS_BEDE AND CCBS_ENDD
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CW_COCOBS ( COCO_CODE, /*경조일련번호*/ COCO_NAME, /*경조명*/ COCO_KIND, /*경조종류*/ FRCW_CODE, /*가족관계*/ CCBS_BEDE, /*시작일*/ CCBS_ENDD, /*종료일*/ EXCC_AMOT, /*경조금액*/ WORK_PROD, /*근속연수*/ CCIT_CODE, /*경조용품*/ REMK_200X, /*비고*/ INST_USID, /*입력자*/ INST_DATE, /*입력일*/ UPDT_USID, /*수정자*/ UPDT_DATE /*수정일*/ ) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(COCO_CODE),TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyymm')||'0000')+1 FROM CW_COCOBS WHERE COCO_CODE LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyymm')||'%'), #COCO_NAME#, #COCO_KIND#, #FRCW_CODE#, #CCBS_BEDE#, #CCBS_ENDD#, #EXCC_AMOT#, #WORK_PROD#, #CCIT_CODE#, #REMK_200X#, #INST_USID#, SYSDATE, #UPDT_USID#, SYSDATE)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CW_COCOBS SET COCO_NAME = #COCO_NAME# /* 경조명 */ , COCO_KIND = #COCO_KIND# /* 경조종류 */ , FRCW_CODE = #FRCW_CODE# /* 가족관계 */ , CCBS_BEDE = #CCBS_BEDE# /* 시작일 */ , CCBS_ENDD = #CCBS_ENDD# /* 종료일 */ , EXCC_AMOT = #EXCC_AMOT# /* 경조금액 */ , WORK_PROD = #WORK_PROD# /* 근속연수 */ , CCIT_CODE = #CCIT_CODE# /* 경조용품 */ , REMK_200X = #REMK_200X# /* 비고 */ , UPDT_USID = #UPDT_USID# /* 수정작업자 */ , UPDT_DATE = SYSDATE /* 수정일시 */ WHERE COCO_CODE = #COCO_CODE# /* 경조일련번호 */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM CW_COCOBS WHERE COCO_CODE = #COCO_CODE# /* 경조일련번호 */
